item.title: Preparation for the OCA Java SE 8 Programmer I Exam
item.author: Author
item.description: Recently I have passed the Oracle Certification Assosiate Java SE 8 Programmer I exam and scored 100%. In this short article I post resources that I used for preparation.

item.title: Using Tomcat for Web Development
item.author: Author
item.description: In this video we will talk about using Tomcat in web development.

item.title: Basic Configuration and Usage of IntelliJ IDEA
item.author: Author
item.description: In this video explained basic configuration of IntelliJ IDEA and usage of important shortcuts. Also we talk about some plugins for IntelliJ IDEA.

item.title: Основы использования Maven
item.author: Author
item.description: В видео рассматривается установка Maven на Mac OS X с помощью пакетного менеджера Homebrew, создание простого проекта в IntelliJ IDEA и использование Maven в IntelliJ IDEA для компиляции проекта.
